#include<iostream>

/*#define gc getchar_unlocked

int readfast(){
	register char x=gc();
	while(x<48||x>57){
		x=gc();
	}
	int ret = 0;
	while(x>47&&x<58){
		ret=(ret<<1)+(ret<<3)+ (x-48);
		x=gc();
	}
	return ret;
}*///First solve then optimise

using namespace std;

int main(){
	int t,time,h1,h2,m1,m2,s1,s2;
	cin>>t;
	while(t>0){
		cin>>h1;
		cin>>m1;
		cin>>s1;
		cin>>h2;
		cin>>m2;
		cin>>s2;
		time=((h2-h1)*3600)+((m2-m1)*60)+(s2-s1);
		time=time%400;
		if((time>=0&&time<=99)||(time>=200&&time<=299)){
			cout<<'S'<<'\n';
		}
		else{
			cout<<'C'<<'\n';
		}
		t--;
	}
return 0;
}
